website_summaries.verdict: This versatile waffle cone maker cooks up soft or crispy sugar and waffle cones, depending on your preference.
pros: Comes with a cone roller to give your cones a professional look
Has a range of temperature settings
Plates are a nice size at 7" in diameter
Indicator light lets you know when it's ready
cons: Instructions that it comes with could be more clear

customer_reviews.title: Do not burn yourself.
customer_reviews.text: The waffles are great. 😋 But...the safety is 0 out of 10. The little handle that open the device is tooooo little. During the cooking it will be covered with HOT steam. So, after I burned myself I started to use a fork to open the waffle maker. I added a photo, how I use the fork to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best waffle cone maker for the price.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best waffle cone maker for the price. Work great, got temperature control. I’m just use different receipts for waffles.
customer_reviews.author: Mindaugas Blazevicius

customer_reviews.title: Easy and delish! Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I made waffle cones for the first time tonight ever and this was so easy! The very first cone didn't come out and I was worried but once it heated up all the way they were pretty easy. I bought this specifically for savory cones. I make the waffle cone out of cornbread and fill it with potatoes and meat and it is delicious. I highly recommend this product! Definitely a great value for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Humboldt love

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: When ordering this item I thought it would have consistent heating and a timer, it has neither. Also the instructions are very limited, the recipe it gives is very good, but it doesn’t say how much of the batter you should put in, so I went through 2 batches trying to figure out exactly how much was needed for a cone. The central ring would nearly burn and the outer edge was not done. I am only using for family treats so it is adequate my second attempt was a little more consistent. Disclaimer: you get what you pay for😩
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Comes with cone!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews that mentioned it didn't come with the plastic cone. When I opened my box, the plastic cone was the first thing I saw! Maybe the sellers decided to add it into the packaging. I'll update this review once I use it! But so far I'm pleased that it came with a piece I was expecting!
customer_reviews.author: Sonni K

customer_reviews.title: Works but is a little confusing to use
customer_reviews.text: No clear instructions on how to use the machine came with it. No on and off button. No instructions on the controls and they are confusing. However it does make the cones.
customer_reviews.author: James E Franken

customer_reviews.title: Best appliance ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite covid appliance. My son has trouble eating yogurt so I use this and instead of making a traditional cone I fold it in half and put yogurt inside like a taco. I also am able to put chicken inside and my little one goes nuts over it. Even better perfect gluten free allergen free ice cream cones throughout the summer. This gets used at least twice a week and the non stick has held up wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do not like too much
customer_reviews.text: I do not like too much This machine. It get wet with the vapor. It is really un confortable and messy. Sometimes when you open it, the water come into the waffle cone mix and mess it up. I am so sad because I thought it was Amazing, but not
customer_reviews.author: MONICA MORALES

customer_reviews.title: Uneven heating.
customer_reviews.text: Uneven heating. Tried for a keto cannoli recipe and was disappointed by uneven heating over the surface. Tried low and slow and hot and fast and browned unevenly on every setting. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Saving Mama

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Directly out of the box, the bottom griddle on our iron did not heat up, and the waffles were poor as a result. Per my conversation with the manufacturer, both griddles should heat.
customer_reviews.author: Prime

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: The plastic tool for rolling cones is not the right tool. The unit gets too hot and the crepes do not roll on this smooth plastic tool. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: uneven heat
customer_reviews.text: this item is easy to use; however, the heat is not distribute evenly. the middle always gets burn by the time the outside area gets cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Normal
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how to say this one. I don’t want to say good or bad, not very easy operate. A little bit hot. But not bad!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Plastic piece no good but otherwise gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Plastic handle is flimsy and breaks off within first use or two but still gets the job done. Just use a towel to not burn yourself
customer_reviews.author: Hollie

customer_reviews.title: The heat is not spread evenly.
customer_reviews.text: The heat is not evenly spread so I have to open and move around, very hard to cook.
customer_reviews.author: TOAN TRAN

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: The kids/teens/adults/seniors love this. How much better is ice-cream than in a fresh newly cooked cone?
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A Read

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Does not brown evenly. Difficult to learn how to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: easy to burn
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to use, easy to pinch, and easy to burn the hands
customer_reviews.author: Rainie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! It’s so easy to use, and clean up. We have enjoyed homemade cones since I got it.
customer_reviews.author: loreen richards

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part
customer_reviews.text: I got the package with missing cone mold. So we can not make a cone with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a defective product: the middle is not heating up as much as the sides. Waffles end up being soggy in the middle and crispy on the sides
customer_reviews.author: JURGA DANYLAITE

customer_reviews.title: bad design
customer_reviews.text: Not very well designed. The feet/frame broke the first time we used it, so the cone didn't cook right-full of holes. I'd return it if I could!!!
customer_reviews.author: carol merkle

customer_reviews.title: Bright colours heats well
customer_reviews.text: Heats well and even. No steam to burn your hands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Better to purchase other brand and save your time with return process
customer_reviews.author: Leila

customer_reviews.title: Seems cheapy but works fine
customer_reviews.text: The unit is very light and it seems kind of cheaply made but it works just fine. The instructions that came with it are not good at all. It doesn’t tell you how long to cook waffles, how many cones the recipe makes etc. I used a recipe I found online and watched a video on how to do it. First 2 cones were a success.
customer_reviews.author: Al Kenney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: Love this waffle maker! Works great and bakes perfect waffles. I’m over the moon with this purchase, definitely worth the price! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Karina B

customer_reviews.title: Waffle BOWLS are great!
customer_reviews.text: Included recipe works great...set heat at 75%... Batter will seem thick compared to normal batter, but it works to keep the batter together when closing lid... Several "trials" over the summer proved to SLOWLY close the lid until locks otherwise batter "spreads" too fast and leaves holes.... Comes with cone roller, good luck with that! Takes practice to get them on the cone maker, but it can be done with patience, an extra set of hands and burned fingers....the challenge is closing the hole at the bottom of the cone.... I have found that waffle "bowls" are way better AND easier. :) would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Cute little machine
customer_reviews.text: Cute little machine. Not heat up very uniform, but still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Received broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my father, we just opened it and it’s broken. Really disappointed because he had everything to make waffles and once we opened it, broken....
customer_reviews.author: Laura Liz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work easily. Very hard to shape the cone .
customer_reviews.author: marjorie lee
